extendedInfo.description: Stress Free Lite is a very quick and simple way to get revenge on objects or people who get you stressed out.  Upgrade to the Pro Version for further weapons and high impact sounds to really blast your stress away.Simply take an image with your phone or choose one from your gallery.  Common choices are:Ex- Boyfriends/GirlfriendsOffice SuppliesBossesYour CarFinancial StatementsEtc...Once you select an image simply blast away until you feel a bit better, or no image remains.

reviews.title: Awesome tool for removing stress. Will buy pro ver
reviews.comment: In this lite version, i got different different tools and played a lot for removing my stress. And this app did that thing perfectly through the way that i wanted. Will surely purchase the pro version.
reviews.author: A Google User
